requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel 3 GHz processor like i7 or better
  • Memory: 15 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 4GB VRAM like GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent - This includes most GPUs scoring greater than 950 points in the 3DMark Fire Strike benchmark
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: My Diggy Dog 2 is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti or equivalent, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: My Diggy Dog 2 is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development
